home.title: Find your star
home.subtitle1: We know of over 2,000,000,000 stars in our night sky.
home.subtitle2: But the one <1>right above</1> you right now?
home.subtitle3: Or the one <1>right above</1> you when you where born?
home.subtitle4: You are probably the first human to notice it.

about_modal.title: About GaiaMaps
about_modal.p1: GaiaMaps is an interactive celestial map created to connect you with the cosmos. Our mission is to make astronomy accessible and personal.
about_modal.p2: Using data from the European Space Agency's Gaia mission, we can pinpoint the stars directly above you at any given moment, or even the ones that were there when you were born.
about_modal.p3: We hope this tool inspires a sense of wonder and a deeper connection to the universe.

info.title: How to use
info.above_you: Select a location or allow location access, then press “Get Stars” to see the sky above you.
info.special_star: Pick your birth date & time, choose a location, then press “Get Stars” to find the star above that moment.
